response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which is designed to enhance your daily routine and bring convenience to your life. This product has been meticulously crafted with quality and functionality in mind, making it a valuable addition to anyone's collection. Given its exceptional features and the time and resources invested into its creation, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I kindly propose to offer it to you for $100. I understand that value is subjective and varies from person to person, so if this price aligns with your expectations, please let me know. If not, we can always explore other options. Looking forward to your response.", "product_price": 100}
